tool_description: The ESG Enterprise API allows you to query and search Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) risk ratings and also material topics according to SDG and SASB. ESG Enterprise database maintains over 250,000 company ESG data over 142 countries. This REST API supports data searches for ESG risk scores that are formatted in JSON with HTTP GET Requests authenticate via Token.
name: ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) Data
title: ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) Data

api_list.name: ESG Indicators
api_list.description: This endpoints retrieve ESG indicators by company names or stock symbols. Support multiple company data in single REST GET request.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.default: company name or stock symbols or exchange:symbol

api_list.name: ESG Ratings
api_list.description: This endpoints retrieve ESG data by company names or stock symbols. Support multiple company data in single REST GET request.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.default: company name or stock symbols or exchange:symbol
